name: The Day That Is Right
description:
A Game all about being cozy and doing tasks under some bizarre strand of "Cozy". 
Patched Version Here IF you want to play the game's loop more than once

In this game the goal is to wake up and finish your tasks. You can travel to 3 different location excluding your home. Locations are The Park, Art Gallery, and Pet Palace. Some places have been cut due to constraints. You can play in any order you choose! Just listen to the music, vibe, relax, and try not to dig in the game too much or the Cozy won't be so grand.  

The Day That Is Right has been made in the time frame. If you'd like photos of the development progress I will be happy to share. 

BUGS: Credits Menu removes menu screen resulting a black screen. Force Quitting the game is the only option, Sorry about this bug.  Another is the game having a chance opening in VR which I Don't understand why. All bug will be patched after the game jam is over.  

Sadly another bug is present where after you complete all tasks once and go to sleep, You cannot redo all the tasks again as your forced to go back to sleep again due to an input check error.
